- `blockhash(uintÂ blockNumber)Â returnsÂ (bytes32)`: hash of the given block whenÂ `blocknumber`Â is one of the 256 most recent blocks; otherwise returns zero
- `block.basefee`Â (`uint`): current blockâ€™s base fee ([EIP-3198](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3198)Â andÂ [EIP-1559](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1559))
- `block.chainid`Â (`uint`): current chain id 
- `block.coinbase`Â (`addressÂ payable`): current block minerâ€™s address 
- `block.difficulty`Â (`uint`): current block difficulty
- `block.gaslimit`Â (`uint`): current block gaslimit 
- `block.number`Â (`uint`): current block number
- `block.timestamp`Â (`uint`): current block timestamp as seconds since unix epoch
- `gasleft()Â returnsÂ (uint256)`: remaining gas
- `msg.data`Â (`bytesÂ calldata`): complete calldata
- `msg.sender`Â (`address`): sender of the message (current call)
- `msg.sig`Â (`bytes4`): first four bytes of the calldata (i.e. function identifier)
- `msg.value`Â (`uint`): number of wei sent with the message
- `tx.gasprice`Â (`uint`): gas price of the transaction
- `tx.origin`Â (`address`): sender of the transaction (full call chain)
